title: Peniche Antipode
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A boat on the bassin de la Villette, it's a bar, cafe, and performance venue. Cooks food on the spot using fair trade ingredients. Has vegetarian and vegan items: soups, tostadas, plates, salads. An alternative kind of place.
streetAddress: Face au 55 quai de la Seine
